description: Developed RESTful APIs using FastAPI to support a real-time analytics platform.
Optimized database queries, reducing response time by 30%.
Implemented unit and integration tests, improving code coverage to 90%.

projects.name: TaskFlow: Workflow Automation Tool
description: Built a full-stack application to automate recurring tasks with dynamic scheduling.
Frontend built with React; backend implemented in Django REST framework.
Implemented OAuth-based authentication and integrated Stripe for payments.

projects.name: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Developed a real-time chat application with WebSocket support using Node.js and Express.
Implemented MongoDB for message persistence and Redis for session management.
Designed a responsive user interface using TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance with ML
description: Developed a predictive maintenance system for industrial equipment using LSTMs.
Used time-series data to predict potential failures with 92% accuracy.
Deployed the model using Flask and Docker for seamless integration.

projects.name: Image Caption Generator
description: Built a neural network model combining CNNs and LSTMs to generate captions for images.
Trained the model on the MS COCO dataset using TensorFlow.
Achieved BLEU score of 0.68 and deployed the system as a web app with Flask.
